alert.note: Alert for Central Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 13 at 2:39PM PDT until July 13 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DRY AND BREEZY CONDITIONS WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON ... .Breezy winds and low relative humidity values this afternoon will lead to increased fire weather concerns across the Cascade gaps. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE FOOTHILLS OF CENTRAL WASHINGTON CASCADES... * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 705 Foothills of Central Washington Cascades (Zone 705). * Winds: Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidities: 8 to 21 percent. * Impacts: Rapid fire spread with any new fires.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
